page.title: 13Names/Leisure/S.Leicester
page.content: {Shakespeare said,"What's in a {name?That which we call a rose by any {other name would smell as sweet". } The most widely used names in the 7-10 years age group in the following schools(1985). {BLABY STOKES S.WIGSTON PARKLAND {Boys Girls Boys Girls} James Claire Paul Joanne Paul Natalie Steven Claire Julie Emma {WIGSTON FAIRFIELD WIGSTON WATERLEYS {Boys Girls Boys Girls} Paul Rachel Christopher Sarah Steven Claire John Kerry Christopher Joanne Martin Claire The most popular{LEISURE INTERESTS}in the above schools we discovered were: (overwhelmingly)Brownies/Girl Guides, Cubs/Boy Scouts,BMX cycles,football and Sunday School,(in one school, judo).
